definitions.definition: An act of rotating one's body 360 degrees in the backward direction.
examples: The gymnast performed a backflip on a trampoline.

definitions.definition: A total reversal in policy or opinion ; a volte-face , a U-turn .

main_definition: ( gymnastics ) An act of rotating one's body 360 degrees in the backward direction.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A total reversal in policy or opinion ; a volte-face , a U-turn .
